description: This file defines Express.js routes for managing a to-do list, including endpoints for listing, creating, updating, toggling completion, and deleting to-do items. It imports route handling functions and sets up HTTP endpoints with associated logic.

methods.name: router.get('/')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all to-do items.

methods.name: router.post('/')
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new to-do item with a specified title.

methods.name: router.put('/:id')
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing to-do item by ID, modifying title and/or completion status.

methods.name: router.patch('/:id/toggle')
methods.description: Handles PATCH requests to toggle the 'completed' status of a specific to-do item.

methods.name: router.delete('/:id')
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a to-do item by ID.
